author: Jesse Schedeen
description: DC Comics has revealed DC K.O., an epic new crossover that sees Superman and three dozen other characters competing in a Mortal Kombat-style death tournament.
title: The Fate of the DC Universe Rests on a Death Tournament in DC K.O.

author: Noah Hunter
description: Time to go bananas.
title: Donkey Kong Switch Games Are Getting Price Cuts Alongside the Release of Bananza

author: Rebekah Valentine
description: Former Subnautica 2 leaders have filed a lawsuit against Unknown Worlds parent Krafton, alleging that Krafton went out of its way to hinder Subnautica 2's development, delay the game, and ultimately fire them from the studio after it learned it may have to pay out a $250 million bonus to employees if the game released on time.
title: Former Subnautica 2 Leaders Accuse Krafton of Hindering Game's Release, Firing Them to Avoid Paying $250 Million Bonus

author: Myles Obenza
description: A worthy addition to any Nintendo gamer's shelf.
title: The Legend of Zelda Encyclopedia Deluxe Edition Just Got a Big Discount and Its an Amazing Nintendo Gift

author: Erik Adams
description: Leviathan is a Ghibli- and steampunk-inspired twist on World War I that feels simultaneously timeless and refreshingly new.
title: Leviathan Review

author: Michael Higham
description: The Genki Attack Vector grip does improve Switch 2 ergonomics when playing handheld, but its unintuitive designs sometimes makes it more trouble than it’s worth.
title: The Switch 2 Genki Attack Vector Can Improve Handheld Grip, But Comes Up Short In Key Ways

author: Myles Obenza
description: Get them before they're gone.
title: These Recently Retired LEGO Sets Are Still Available on Amazon, but Stock Is Limited

author: Jim Vejvoda
description: IGN has partnered with Warner Bros. and IMAX to launch the first trailer for Mortal Kombat II. Join us across our platforms – including IGN.com, YouTube, Twitch, and our socials – beginning July 17 at 8:05am PT and counting down to the Official Trailer debut at 9am PT.
title: Mortal Kombat II | Trailer Event Kountdown

author: Lloyd Coombes
description: As of July 15, these are the biggest movers and shakers for MTG, including some notable price changes for Final Fantasy cards, and a look ahead at Edge of Eternities.
title: The Biggest Magic: The Gathering Crashers and Climbers This Week - July 16

author: Eric Song
description: AMD's best gaming processors of 2025.
title: The Powerful AMD Ryzen 9800X3D and 9950X3D Gaming CPUs Are Down to the Lowest Prices Ever

author: Michael Cripe
description: The Fantastic Four: First Steps will finally introduce a handful of big names to the MCU, but director Matt Shakman says John Malkovich’s Red Ghost won’t be one of them.
title: Fantastic Four: First Steps Will No Longer Feature John Malkovich as Red Ghost, Director Says

author: Jesse Schedeen
description: DC's wildly popular Absolute Universe is getting its first crossover story this October, one dubbed Absolute Evil.
title: Absolute Evil Is DC's First Absolute Universe Crossover

author: Jim Vejvoda
description: Enjoy the trailer for Uncaged Fury, a faux 1990s action movie starring Mortal Kombat II’s Johnny Cage (played by Karl Urban). The trailer is in the style of the kind of cheesy ‘90s action movies that might have starred Steven Seagal or Jean-Claude Van Damme.
title: Uncaged Fury: Enjoy This Fake Movie Trailer Starring Mortal Kombat II's Johnny Cage

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: A new report into Superman has allegedly revealed the salaries of its top stars as well as writer and director James Gunn, and offered a hint at where DC Studios is headed next.
title: New Report Reveals Alleged Superman Salaries for James Gunn, David Corenswet, Rachel Brosnahan, and Nicholas Hoult, Claims Wonder Woman Fast-Tracked Over Superman 2

author: Chris Reed
description: Save on Elden Ring Nightreign, Monster Hunter Wilds, and more.
title: Some of the Best Deals on Games After Prime Day Are Actually at GameFly

author: Christian Wait
description: As of July 16, Nintendo Switch 2 invites are open at Amazon for $499.99, Pokémon TCG Destined Rivals Elite Trainer Box is down to $88.95, and Superman 2025 Steelbook is up for preorder.
title: Deals for Today: Switch 2 Invites Open Up On Amazon And Destined Rivals Is Now Below Market Value

author: Ben Williams
description: Shop PS5 consoles, bundles & hit games up to 56% off in the PS Direct Summer Sale, live now through July 29.
title: PS Direct’s Summer Sale Has Some of the Best PS5 Console & Game Deals I’ve Seen in Ages

author: Jesse Schedeen
description: The beloved animated series Murder Drones may be over, but it's finding new life as a graphic novel thanks to Oni Press.
title: Beloved Animated Web Series Murder Drones Makes the Jump to Comics | Comic-Con 2025

author: Erik Adams
description: The new I Know What You Did Last Summer is a capable legacy sequel with some charms, but its plot is so close to the first film in the series that the story barely has any room to breathe.
title: I Know What You Did Last Summer Review

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: CD Projekt has revealed what to expect from Cyberpunk 2077 patch 2.3, including contents and a release date.
title: Cyberpunk 2077 Patch 2.3 Contents and Release Date Confirmed, Although Nintendo Switch 2 Owners Will Have to Wait

author: Lex Briscuso
description: Emmy nominations dropped yesterday — and needless to say, audiences have been heavily debating which shows and performers have been recognized for their hard work and which have not. Everyone’s got their opinions, including Andor creator Tony Gilroy, who recently opened up about who he feels is missing from the nominations list from his own series.
title: Andor Creator Tony Gilroy Responds to Diego Luna and Genevieve O'Reilly Emmy Snubs

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Netflix has released the first full trailer for Stranger Things Season 5, offering fans their best look yet at the final chapter in one of the most popular streaming shows of all time.
title: Stranger Things Season 5 Debut Trailer Reveals First Full Look at the Final Chapter in Netflix's Hugely Popular Series

author: Tom Phillips
description: Nintendo has announced the actors set to portray Link and Zelda in its upcoming live-action The Legend of Zelda film — but who are Bo Bragason and Benjamin Evan Ainsworth?
title: Who Are the Actors Behind Link and Zelda in Nintendo's Live-Action The Legend of Zelda Movie?

author: Ben Williams
description: Destined Rivals ETBs are back on Amazon, but at $88.95 and well above MSRP, so here’s why prices are inflated and where you might find a better deal.
title: Amazon Relists New Destined Rivals Pokémon Card Set, But With a 78% Markup

author: Jesse Schedeen
description: Titan Comics has epic plans in mind for Conan the Barbarian in October 2025, including a big milestone special and a remastered version of classic Marvel-era content.
title: Titan Comics Reveals Major New Conan the Barbarian Comics for October 2025 | Comic-Con 2025

author: Vikki Blake
description: Roblox has launched a new licensing platform to allow easier connections between Roblox creators and IP holders, including Netflix, Lionsgate, and Sega.
title: Roblox Creators Can Now Apply To License Like A Dragon From Sega In Their Games

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: James Gunn’s rebooted DC Universe is off to a flyer with Superman, but whose story is the DCU really? In a new interview, Gunn of course wouldn't say, but did tease they’re a character no-one would expect.
title: James Gunn Offers Cryptic Tease About Who His Rebooted DC Universe Is Actually About, Directs Fans to Peacemaker Season 2 for Clues

author: Logan Plant
description: Nintendo’s great ape finally returns to the spotlight in a truly groundbreaking adventure.
title: Donkey Kong Bananza Review

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Colin Farrell has insisted Penguin Season 2 is not currently in the works, but he has pointed to Matt Reeves’ The Batman 2 and even namechecked the so-far unannounced Batman 3.
title: Colin Farrell Insists The Penguin Season 2 Is Not in the Works, but He Namechecked Batman 2 and Even Batman 3 and Now I’m Worried We’re Getting Ahead of Ourselves

author: Tom Phillips
description: The Last of Us Season 3 is "definitely planned" to arrive in 2027, HBO boss Casey Bloys has confirmed, pinning down a firm launch window for the series' next — and potentially last — run of episodes.
title: The Last of Us Season 3 'Planned for 2027' and Could Be the Series' End, HBO Boss Says

author: Robert Anderson
description: Amazon has opened invites for the Nintendo Switch 2 + Mario Kart World bundle, and some customers are already getting theirs.
title: Nintendo Switch 2 Invites Are Finally Being Sent Out by Amazon, Just in Time for Donkey Kong Banaza

author: Vikki Blake
description: Bungie has confirmed it is "actively re-recording" some of the dialogue in Destiny 2 to restore the voices of characters like Vanguard Ikora Rey.
title: Yes, Destiny 2's Ikora Does Sound Different, But Bungie Is Now 'Actively Re-Recording' Her Dialogue With The Original Voice Performer

author: Ben Williams
description: Grab the 27,000mAh INIU 140W power bank for just $43.99 with code, which is perfect for Nintendo Switch 2, Steam Deck, and laptops.
title: This Is the Ultimate Power Bank for the Switch 2 at 55% Off — I Only Regret Now Buying One Already

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Arnold Schwarzenegger has revealed which movie he made that he really wishes would get a sequel.
title: Arnold Schwarzenegger Reveals Which Movie He Made That He Really Wishes Would Get a Sequel

author: Tom Phillips
description: Nintendo has confirmed the lead actors for its upcoming live action The Legend of Zelda movie.
title: Nintendo Confirms Actors Set to Play Link and Zelda in Live-Action The Legend of Zelda Film

author: Tom Phillips
description: Switch 2 owners will be able to take upcoming Nintendo exclusive Drag x Drive for a test run next month — but only with an active Switch Online subscription.
title: Nintendo Confirms Public Demo for Its Secretive Switch 2 Exclusive Drag X Drive — but You'll Need a Switch Online Subscription to Play

author: Vikki Blake
description: Within 20 minutes of implementing unpopular changes to the violence and nudity in VOID Interactive's shooter Ready or Not, a mod was available to retcon the changes.
title: Ready Or Not Modder Retcons 'Censorship' Changes Within An Hour Of New Patch Going Live

author: Tom Phillips
description: There's now a toe-tapping Easter egg for this year's A Minecraft Movie hidden within the actual Minecraft game — though you'll need to hunt down a certain iconic enemy in order to find it.
title: Steve's Lava Chicken Song Added to Minecraft, but You'll Need to Hunt a Chicken Jockey to Find It

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: It seems Krypto the Superdog is having an even bigger impact on audiences than expected. According to a report by The Wrap, Google searches for “adopt a dog near me” jumped 513% after Superman came out last weekend, while “rescue dog adoption near me” rose by 163%.
title: Krypto's Star Turn in Superman Sparks Surge in 'Adopt a Dog Near Me' Google Searches — and James Gunn Sounds Delighted

author: Michael Cripe
description: Blood Line, a video game spinoff for Zack Snyder’s Rebel Moon, finally launched today as the Netflix movie series it’s based on remains with an uncertain future.
title: Rebel Moon Video Game Launches for Netflix Subscribers as Zack Snyder Keeps Plans for Future Movies Paused

author: Adam Mathew
description: It may be mid-July, but the sales heat hasn’t let up.
title: AU Deals: Appealing Donkey Kong Price Cuts, Discounted Must Owns For Your Shame Pile, and More!

author: Eric Song
description: You get the same warranty as buying brand new.
title: The Bose Summer Sale Takes an Extra 25% Off Refurbished Headphones, Earbuds, Soundbars, and Speakers
